name: Escape Castle (alser)
description:
Escape Castle is my first game, imitating games like the classic Zeldas and with an important Roguelike component. You embody a slave who is forced to participate as a gladiator, your goal is to escape from the castle, if you are captured you will return to the coliseum, where your death will lie in wait. Get escape from the Castle or fight to the death for your life. You are ready?
Controls:
Move-> ASWD or Directional
Run-> Move+Space
Sword Attack-> z
Shield Protection->x
Hammer Throw->c
Stats-> Tab
Alert!
Keep an eye on the Stamina-> Yellow bar.
